content: @Tim Abbott @Rishi Gupta @Vaida Plankyte
@Nitin Jain the large screenshots you send are making it even more clear we need to have the thumbnail code deployed soon ;)
@Nitin Jain Great work! üëç
@Boris Yankov Yeah I too think for the same. üòÄ
looks great! (this is minor & for when you're implementing: the header should read "appsolutely" :) )

On a completely unrelated note, your screenshot above @Nitin Jain completely destroys the performance of the site and the lightbox. Chrome on my mac has an incredibly difficult time rendering that PNG file. Though it isn't large in size (700kb), it is huge in area (7000x8000px), and literally drops my browser down to 1fps. @Tim Abbott, this is a pretty good urgent example of how people can destroy the perf for everyone on the server with one image; and this wasn't even malicious. :)

You should delete or edit this message if you can @Nitin Jain, and in the near future please downsize all PNGs to like 2000px wide, not 7000px wide. I imagine if my MBP can't even handle this then other people's computers are getting locked up just by this being on screen.
I had to force quit a couple times on my macbook air
Yeah, I just deleted the message just to save everyone else pain

final.png
